Articles.Content: in KSP I find myself using 10-20 different saves/worlds/universes, whatever, and the current system merely puts them in alphabetical order. This does not work for me because i find myself having to go to the bottom of the list to find a world I was just playing in, it is not a huge issue or anything, but it doesn't work for me. a better way to sort would be by date last played, or by amount of active vessles, or by world type, or by total time played,or manualy.
Listing by file date would make total sense to me, too. The first 30 or so files in my careers are usually called "daily checkpoint MM-dd" and I have to get past those to find "mun landing begins"
clarification: i mean the main worlds, like the ones that let you select career, sandbox or science
